title: Responsibility of the state banks to protect small entrepreneurs- President Rajapaksa
content: – by Janaka Alahapperuma – President Mahinda Rajapaksa emphasised, it is the responsibility of the state banks to safeguard the small entrepreneur. He reiterated that state banks also should provide loans to minor entrepreneurs in villages and upgrade them without restricting in granting loans only to entrepreneurs in Colombo.
